section.title: Prepositions
section.sectiontitle: There are many fixed phrases which use prepositions. Verb + preposition: opt for, distinguish from, succeed in, etc.
section.text1a: We opted for cheaper flights in the end.
section.sectiontitle2: Adjective + preposition: short of, riddled with, lacking in, nervous about ...
section.text4a: The village is rather lacking in amenities.
